GSD.product_version: versions from v3.7 to before v4.14.283
GSD.description:
tcp: tcp_rtx_synack() can be called from process context

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.283 by commit c348b0f8d035fc4bdc040796889beec7218bd1b8, it was introduced in version v3.7 by commit 168a8f58059a22feb9e9a2dcc1b8053dbbbc12ef. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tcp: tcp_rtx_synack() can be called from process context
